title: LF ADC and sup to make a 5 man
body:
OCE three man looking for a bot lane to play as 5 in flex.
Ranks are b5, b2 and s5, anyone bronze to mid silver welcome.
Can be a duo or individual ad and support players

replies.body:
I'm an adc main, can play any adc with relative success
Rank is s5 and my IGN is Kaneki Kazuto

Yo i'm silver 4, can play adcs such as Xayah, Twitch, Ezreal, Jhin(When he is in meta again), Lucian and Vayne

I also use discord

IGN: ThisJunglerFeeds

I also know a great support main who i normally play with regularly

I am a sup main and would be happy to join the team

I am ThisJunglerFeeds duo partner
when are you guys available to play?
I'm S5 and interested in being either adc or supp I can play both positions.
what time/s can you normally play?

I can usually play Monday and Friday afternoons and Saturdays 

Add me IGN-ShadowAquarius.
when are you usually able to play?

bronze 4 support main just coming back to the game was silver 5 2 seasons ago
interested in playing ranked flex que bus mainly looking for some good guys to play with
when are you able to play?
friends list is full im a silver 4/3 adc main and can play supp
I have added you on friend app, I am interested but I am not good at all, not even ranked btw
